creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: rocky, somewhat abstract seascape: black and blue horizontal lines make up the calm water; black rocks in background are striped with purple designs; in foreground, black rocks punctuated with yellow details including yellow outline of partially overturned car (?); hints of abstract foliage at R with green; patterns in rocks and foliage resemble textile patterns; rich, saturated black, blue, purple, yellow, and greens; sky is mostly white save a strip of blue gradient at top with white moon
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Landscape M-A
